Class F_StockRW

java.lang.Object
ci553.ministore.middle.F_StockR
ci553.ministore.middle.F_StockRW
All Implemented Interfaces:
StockReader, StockReadWriter
public class F_StockRW extends F_StockR implements StockReadWriter
Facade for read/write access to the stock list. The actual implementation of this is held on the middle tier. The actual stock list is held in a relational DataBase on the third tier. This class provides methods to interact with the remote stock system using RMI (Remote Method Invocation). It handles connection management, remote method invocation, and error recovery.
Version:
2.0

    • F_StockRW

      public F_StockRW(String url)
      Creates a new facade for stock read/write operations. Initializes RMI connection details.
      Parameters:
      url - The RMI URL for the remote stock service

  • Method Details

    • buyStock

      public boolean buyStock(String number, int amount) throws StockException
      Buys stock by decrementing available quantity. Thread-safe and handles reconnection if needed.
      Specified by:
      buyStock in interface StockReadWriter
      Parameters:
      number - Product number to purchase
      amount - Quantity to buy
      Returns:
      true if purchase successful, false if insufficient stock
      Throws:
      StockException - if remote operation fails
